de.ityx.mediatrix.api.client

Interface ICCall


  • public interface ICCall
    provides functions to manage the phone objects Call. The functions are called in the phone panel.
    How to use:
    API.getClientAPI().getCallAPI().loadCallsFromCustomer(id);

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean delete(Call myObj)
      Deletes the given customer's calls (myObj)

      Loads the Call Object identified by id

      Refreshes the given customer's calls (myObj)
